001package org.consensusj.bitcoin.jsonrpc.test;
002
003import org.bitcoinj.base.BitcoinNetwork;
004import org.consensusj.bitcoin.jsonrpc.BitcoinExtendedClient;
005import org.consensusj.jsonrpc.JsonRpcException;
006import org.consensusj.bitcoin.json.pojo.Outpoint;
007import org.consensusj.bitcoin.json.pojo.SignedRawTransaction;
008import org.consensusj.bitcoin.json.pojo.UnspentOutput;
009import org.bitcoinj.base.Address;
010import org.bitcoinj.base.Coin;
011import org.bitcoinj.base.Sha256Hash;
012import org.slf4j.Logger;
013import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
014
015import java.io.IOException;
016import java.util.List;
017import java.util.Map;
018import java.util.stream.Collectors;
019
020/**
021 * FundingSource using RegTest mining, BitcoinExtendedClient (with getRegTestMiningAddress),
022 * and the server's default wallet for accumulating coins.
023 */
024public class RegTestFundingSource implements FundingSource {
025    private final Coin txFee = Coin.valueOf(200_000);
026    private final Integer defaultMaxConf = 9999999;
027    private static final Logger log = LoggerFactory.getLogger(RegTestFundingSource.class);
028    protected final BitcoinExtendedClient client;
029
030    public RegTestFundingSource(BitcoinExtendedClient client) {
031        this.client = client;
032    }
033
034    /**
035     * Generate blocks (if necessary) and fund an address with requested amount of BTC.
036     * This will create, sign, and transmit a transaction to fund an address with BTC. This method
037     * does not mine a block to confirm the transaction. A separate call to {@link BitcoinExtendedClient#generateBlocks(int)}
038     * or equivalent must be made to confirm the transaction.
039     *
040     * @param toAddress Address to fund with BTC
041     * @param requestAmount Amount of BTC to "mine" and send (minimum ending balance of toAddress?)
042     * @return The hash of an unconfirmed transaction that provides the funds.
043     */
044    @Override
045    public Sha256Hash requestBitcoin(Address toAddress, Coin requestAmount) throws JsonRpcException, IOException {
046        log.info("requestBitcoin requesting {} for {}", requestAmount.toPlainString(), toAddress);
047        if (requestAmount.value > BitcoinNetwork.MAX_MONEY.value) {
048            throw new IllegalArgumentException("request exceeds MAX_MONEY");
049        }
050
051        // Generate blocks until regTestMiningAddress has enough funds
052        List<UnspentOutput> unspent = mineEnoughFunds(requestAmount);
053        List<Outpoint> inputs = unspentOutputsToOutpoints(unspent);
054        Coin availableToSpend = sumUnspentOutputs(unspent);
055
056        // Create the funding transaction
057        Map<Address, Coin> outputs = calcChange(availableToSpend, requestAmount, toAddress, client.getRegTestMiningAddress());
058        String unsignedTxHex = client.createRawTransaction(inputs, outputs);
059
060        // Sign the funding transaction
061        SignedRawTransaction signingResult = client.signRawTransactionWithWallet(unsignedTxHex);
062        if (!signingResult.isComplete()) {
063            log.error("Unable to complete signing!");
064            log.error("SigningResult: {}", toJson(signingResult));
065        }
066        assert signingResult.isComplete();
067
068        // Send the funding transaction
069        Sha256Hash txid = sendRawTransactionUnlimitedFees(signingResult.getHex());
070        log.info("Funding transaction sent: {}", txid);
071
072        return txid;
073    }
074
075    /**
076     * Create an address and fund it with bitcoin.
077     * This will create, sign, and transmit a transaction to fund an address with BTC. This method
078     * does not mine a block to confirm the transaction. A separate call to {@link BitcoinExtendedClient#generateBlocks(int)}
079     * or equivalent must be made to confirm the transaction.
080     *
081     * @param amount requested amount of BTC
082     * @return Newly created address that will have the requested amount of bitcoin after the next block is mined
083     */
084    @Override
085    public Address createFundedAddress(Coin amount) throws Exception {
086        Address address = client.getNewAddress();
087        requestBitcoin(address, amount);
088        return address;
089    }
090
091    /**
092     * Mine zero or more blocks until {@code availableFunds >= requestedAmount + fee}
093     *
094     * @param requestAmount Funds requested
095     * @return A list of unspent outputs
096     * @throws IOException ISH
097     */
098    private List<UnspentOutput> mineEnoughFunds(Coin requestAmount) throws IOException {
099        Coin neededAmount = requestAmount.plus(txFee);
100
101        List<UnspentOutput> available = availableFunds();
102
103        while (sumUnspentOutputs(available).isLessThan(neededAmount)) {
104            client.generateBlocks(1);
105            available = availableFunds();
106            logMined(neededAmount, available);
107        }
108
109        log.info("mineEnoughFunds: Needed: {} Returned: {}", neededAmount.toPlainString(), sumUnspentOutputs(available).toPlainString());
110
111        return available;
112    }
113
114    private void logMined(Coin needed, List<UnspentOutput> available) throws IOException {
115        int height = client.getBlockCount();
116        log.warn("⛏⛏⛏⛏⛏ Mined {} (blk#{}): Available: {} Needed: {} ⛏⛏⛏⛏⛏",
117                client.getBlockSubsidy(height).toPlainString(),
118                height,
119                sumUnspentOutputs(available).toPlainString(),
120                needed.toPlainString());
121    }
122
123    private Map<Address, Coin> calcChange(Coin availableFunds, Coin amountToSend, Address destAddress, Address changeAddress) {
124        Coin change = availableFunds.minus(amountToSend.plus(txFee));
125        return change.isPositive()
126                ? Map.of(destAddress, amountToSend, changeAddress, change)  // include change output
127                : Map.of(destAddress, amountToSend);                        // no change output
128    }
129
130    /**
131     * Create everything needed to assemble a custom transaction
132     * @param amount Amount of BTC to be available on new address
133     * @return An address, private key, and list of unspent outputs
134     * @throws JsonRpcException
135     * @throws IOException
136     */
137    public TransactionIngredients createIngredients(Coin amount) throws JsonRpcException, IOException {
138        TransactionIngredients ingredients = new TransactionIngredients();
139        Address address = client.getNewAddress();
140        requestBitcoin(address, amount);
141        ingredients.address = address;
142        ingredients.privateKey = client.dumpPrivKey(address);
143        ingredients.outPoints = client.listUnspentOutPoints(address);
144        return ingredients;
145    }
146
147    @Override
148    public void fundingSourceMaintenance() {
149        try {
150            consolidateCoins();
151        } catch (JsonRpcException e) {
152            log.error("exception: ", e);
153            throw new RuntimeException(e);
154        } catch (IOException e) {
155            log.error("exception: ", e);
156            throw new RuntimeException(e);
157        }
158    }
159
160    /**
161     * Collects *all* unspent outputs and sends to the RegTestMiningAddress. No new block is generated afterwards.
162     *
163     * NOTE: This consolidates all coins in the wallet to the RegTestMiningAddress and should only be run
164     * at the end of a test (if you are using wallet addresses in your test)
165     *
166     * Can be used in cleanupSpec() methods of integration tests.
167     *
168     * @see <a href="https://github.com/OmniLayer/OmniJ/issues/50">Issue #50 on GitHub</a>
169     */
170    void consolidateCoins() throws JsonRpcException, IOException {
171        // Get all UTXOs in the servers wallet
172        List<UnspentOutput> unspentOutputs = getSpendable();
173
174        // Check if the amount is large enough to be worth consolidating
175        Coin amountIn = sumUnspentOutputs(unspentOutputs);
176        log.info("We have {} in {} utxos.", amountIn.toPlainString(), unspentOutputs.size());
177        if (unspentOutputs.size() < 10 || amountIn.value <= 10 * txFee.value) {
178            log.info("Not consolidating.");
179            return;
180        }
181
182        // Gather inputs
183        List<Outpoint> inputs = unspentOutputsToOutpoints(unspentOutputs);
184
185        // Send it all to the RegTestMiningAddress
186        Map<Address,Coin> outputs = Map.of(client.getRegTestMiningAddress(), amountIn.subtract(txFee));
187
188        String unsignedTxHex = client.createRawTransaction(inputs, outputs);
189        SignedRawTransaction signingResult = client.signRawTransactionWithWallet(unsignedTxHex);
190
191        boolean complete = signingResult.isComplete();
192        if (!complete) {
193            log.error("Unable to complete signing on consolidate coins transaction.");
194            log.error("SigningResult: {}", toJson(signingResult));
195        }
196        assert complete;
197
198        String signedTxHex = signingResult.getHex();
199        Sha256Hash txid = sendRawTransactionUnlimitedFees(signedTxHex);
200        log.warn("⭄⭄⭄⭄⭄⭄⭄ Consolidating transaction sent, txid = {}", txid);
201    }
202
203    private String toJson(SignedRawTransaction signingResult) {
204        return client.getMapper().valueToTree(signingResult).toPrettyString();
205    }
206
207    /**
208     * Get available funds in the RegTestMiningAddress
209     */
210    private List<UnspentOutput> availableFunds() throws IOException {
211        return getSpendable(client.getRegTestMiningAddress());
212    }
213
214    /**
215     * Get all available funds in the server-side wallet
216     */
217    private List<UnspentOutput> getSpendable() throws  JsonRpcException, IOException {
218        return client.listUnspent(1, defaultMaxConf, null, null);
219    }
220
221    /**
222     * Get all available funds in a specific address in the server-side wallet
223     */
224    private List<UnspentOutput> getSpendable(Address address) throws  JsonRpcException, IOException {
225        return client.listUnspent(1, defaultMaxConf, address)
226                .stream()
227                .filter(out -> out.isSpendable() && out.isSafe())
228                .collect(Collectors.toList());
229    }
230
231    private List<Outpoint> unspentOutputsToOutpoints(List<UnspentOutput> unspentOutputs) {
232        return unspentOutputs.stream()
233                .map(output -> new Outpoint(output.getTxid(), output.getVout()))   // map from UnspentOutput to Outpoint
234                .collect(Collectors.toList());
235    }
236
237    private Coin sumUnspentOutputs(List<UnspentOutput> unspentOutputs) {
238        return unspentOutputs.stream()
239                .map(UnspentOutput::getAmount)
240                .reduce(Coin.ZERO, Coin::add);
241    }
242
243    private Sha256Hash sendRawTransactionUnlimitedFees(String hexTx) throws IOException {
244        return client.sendRawTransaction(hexTx, Coin.ZERO);
245    }
246}
